summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Bradford Street from Renton Avenue to 32nd Avenue South, by grading the same, and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9516 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of " Payment in Bonds".
